name: Brussels Sprouts And Potato In Tomato Gravy. Vegan Gluten Free.
description: Brussels sprouts and potato in tomato gravy. A delicious, healthy and delicious dish. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 8  Brussels sprouts ((stems cut and outer leaves removed))
1/2 inch ginger chopped ((can be substituted with ginger paste, also optional))
4 cloves of garlic peeled and chopped ((can be substituted with garlic paste))
1/2 teaspoon red chili flakes or 1 green chili (to taste)
1 teaspoon Chana Masala powder blend or Garam masala

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep pan, add oil, heat at medium heat and add onions.
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep pan, add oil, heat at medium heat and add onions.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until onions are translucent. Add in the chopped green chili, ginger, garlic, mix and cool for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until onions are translucent. Add in the chopped green chili, ginger, garlic, mix and cool for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the spices, asofetida, garam masala or chana masala blend, mix well and cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the spices, asofetida, garam masala or chana masala blend, mix well and cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped tomato and cook on medium, partially covered for 5-7 minutes until tomatoes are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped tomato and cook on medium, partially covered for 5-7 minutes until tomatoes are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the salt, potato and the halved brussels sprouts and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the salt, potato and the halved brussels sprouts and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1-1.5 cups water and cook covered on low heat for 20-25 minutes with occasional stirring, until potatoes are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1-1.5 cups water and cook covered on low heat for 20-25 minutes with occasional stirring, until potatoes are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro, with long grain rice or flat bread(Roti/Naan).
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro, with long grain rice or flat bread(Roti/Naan).

keywords: tomato sauce, vegan side dish, vegetable side dish
